full_translation:
**The Upper Clarity Scripture of the Winding Simplicity Formulary and Register**

**Scripture Title:** *The Upper Clarity Scripture of the Winding Simplicity Formulary and Register*
**Author:** Unknown, likely composed during the Northern and Southern Dynasties. Compiled from six Upper Clarity scriptures and registers, including *The Formulary of Supreme Simplicity*, *The Seven Luminaries of the Vast Expanse*, and *The Treasured Register of the River Chart*. One scroll.

**Source Text:** *Daoist Canon of the Orthodox Unity*, Proper Section I.

---

**The Upper Clarity Scripture of the Winding Simplicity Formulary and Register**
*Also titled: The Great Writ of the Nine Heavens’ Phoenix Qi and the Mysterious Mound*

Transmitted by the Left Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate.
The Most High bestowed it upon the Left Perfected, who in turn conveyed it to the Azure Lad of the Fangzhu Palace in the Eastern Sea, to be transmitted only to those superior adepts whose names are inscribed in jade—those destined to become Perfected Immortals. After wearing it for thirty years, one may behold the Three Primordial Lords and be welcomed by the Sagely Lord in the Golden Towers of Upper Clarity. Every seven hundred years, it may be passed to two recipients.

Within the oratory, one pound of incense is burned. Upon completion of the transmission, the initiate swears a blood oath upon golden silk, substituting for the blood covenant of ascending the altar.

---

**#1. The Winding Simplicity Formulary**

The Winding Simplicity commands the ghosts of the Six Heavens, enslaves the spirits of the myriad essences, summons the Five Thearchs, governs the Five Marchmounts, seals the rivers and marshes, and calls forth the hundred ghosts. Its formulary subdues the tigers and leopards of the famed mountains, tames the dragons of the hundred rivers, commands the ten thousand ghosts, and drives away the ten thousand perversities.

All the above talismans are to be inscribed in cinnabar.

**The Covenant Formulary**

Three bolts of white silk, thirty feet in length, serve as the covenant of blood and fluid, substituting for the blood oath of the Winding Simplicity. Without purification and solemnity, the register cannot be unbound.

Twenty feet of plain brocade safeguard the covenant of immortals and transcendents, serving as the oath for three transmissions over seven hundred years. When entering peril, water, fire, mountains, or chambers, the register must be worn.

Three pairs of golden rings secure the covenant of great deliverance and eternal life, ensuring the heart’s unobstructed pact. Without this writ, a Daoist may not behold the Lords of the Three Origins.

Nine ounces of incense uphold the covenant of communion with the numinous, forming the pact with the spirits of the unseen. Without it, the ghosts of the Six Heavens cannot be summoned or subdued.

When a man receives the transmission, he faces north while the master faces south. When a woman receives it, she faces south while the master faces north. The submission of documents and offerings must be orally transmitted according to the master’s instructions. At the time of transmission, face north.

For men, after ten years, another purification rite and document submission are required. For women, after ten years, one offering is made.

The register, wine, and dried meats are arranged in a single chamber, invoking the Highest Clarity’s Lofty Perfected, the Radiant Spirit Realized Person, and the Venerable Master of the Celestial Palace to uphold the precepts.

If the recipient receives the register in person, the oral transmission suffices—no written covenant on silk, rings, incense, or bodily oath is needed.

The Highest Clarity’s Lofty Transcendent, the Radiant Cloud Realized Person, initiates the Great Register of Heaven. The Venerable Master of the Celestial Palace bestows it upon the Lords of the Five Marchmounts. Wearing it dispels misfortune, averts calamity, repels evil, expels perversity, shields against myriad essences, disperses the hundred beasts, commands ghostly beings, extends life by ten years, revives the soul, reverses aging, stabilizes the body, and ensures enduring existence. It is also called the *Inevitable Life Contract of the Three Heavens*.

The Venerable Master of the Nine Heavens, accompanied by ten female officials of the White Silk Jade Court, stations them to the left and right of the disciple.

For the above talismans, unless specified by brush and fixed colors, all are to be inscribed in cinnabar.

The *Mysterious Mound Scripture of the Nine Heavens’ Phoenix Qi*, the *Immortal Regulations of the Venerable Master of the Dark Capital*—after three days of wearing, the transmission is sealed with green silk, three pairs of rings, incense, and silk, pledging before the records of the Year-Star: no negligence, no deceit, no malice, no haste, but the practice of benevolence, the accumulation of virtue, the preservation of spirit, and the contemplation of the real. The bearer of the register is a transcendent.

The *Register of the Seven Origins of the Vast Expanse*
The *Vermilion Script Talisman of the Solar Radiance and Cinnabar Origin*

The *Lunar Radiance Yellow Origin Azure-Script Talisman*
The *Year-Star Vermilion-Script Talisman*
The *Blazing Deluder Yellow-Script Talisman*
The *Great White Black-Script Talisman*
The *Ephemeral Star Azure-Script Talisman*
The *Quelling Star Vermilion-Script Talisman*
The *Vermilion Talisman* (vermilion-script)
The *Vermilion Talisman* (vermilion-script)
The *Black Talisman* (black-script)
The *Orpiment Talisman* (yellow-script)

The above section is to be transcribed and worn by the disciple.

These are based on the sun, moon, and five planets as the Seven Origins, with an additional five talismans corresponding to those in the *Scripture of Dispelling Demons*. However, the *Scripture of Dispelling Demons* contains forty-nine talismans in total, each placed in varying spaces of differing widths. Here, only a few remain, the rest having been lost.

Another yellow talisman is said to originate from the *True Reports*, described as the *Talisman of the Supreme Ultimate Perfected, Commanding the Northern Emperor of Fengtai Peak*, found in the *Scripture of the Jade Horse*. The details remain unclear.

Otherwise, the talismans of the Seven Origins are roughly described in transmitted scriptures with methods for their application, though this is a manual for wearing them, hence no further explanation is given. It is fitting to follow the *True [Reports]*, inscribing them in mixed colors upon varied silks, receiving and wearing them.

One account of the *Command of Fengtai Peak* states in the talismanic decrees: "Whoever carries this talisman shall enclose it in a layered purple pouch and wear it upon the head."

The *Register of the Ten Heavens’ Summoning Dragons of the Supreme Clarity* (all talismans above in vermilion-script)

The *Register of the Eight Might’s Summoning Dragons of the Supreme Clarity*

On the first day of a certain month in a certain year, [Name], a disciple of [State] [County] [Abbey/Observatory], receiving the [Name] Register of the [Peak] Perfected, respectfully approaches the gate of the Supreme Clarity Great Cavern Master [Name], to receive the *Supreme Clarity Jade Essence Secret Register of the Turning Chariot and Perfect Dao*, the *True Scripture of the Great Cavern*, and other texts. I vow to cultivate in accordance with the Mysterious Regulations, to save beings and assist all things. Should I violate this oath, I willingly accept the underworld’s judgment, offering my body in repentance to the Three Officials of Heaven, Earth, and Water, without resentment.

Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances of the Supreme Lord’s Mysterious Regulations. (All above in vermilion-script)

**Seasonal Petitions to Mountains and Waters**

*Spring Commencement (jia-yin day), Summer Commencement (jia-wu day), Autumn Commencement (jia-shen day), Winter Commencement (jia-zi day)*
The four talismans above are inscribed in vermilion on green ground with vermilion borders.

The Dragon Kings of the Thirty-Five Seas of the East come in attendance.
The Dragon Kings of the Thirty-Five Seas of the South come in attendance.
The Dragon Kings of the Thirty-Five Seas of the West come in abundance.
The Dragon Kings of the Thirty-Five Seas of the North come in rectitude.
The true writs and talismans above are all inscribed in vermilion.

**[Supreme Clarity River Chart Register of the Nine August Guests] #2**
A certain year, a certain month, the first day, [Name], a disciple of [State] [County] [Abbey/Observatory] receiving the [Name] Register, respectfully approaches the gate of the Supreme Clarity Great Cavern Master [Name], to pledge and receive the *Supreme Essence Great Mystery Ha-Tu Register of the Nine Stars*.

A certain year, a certain month, the first day, [Name], a disciple of [State] [County] [Abbey/Observatory] receiving the [Name] Register of the [Peak] Perfected, reverently approaches the gate of the Supreme Essence Great Cavern Master [Name], to receive the talisman of the Nine Stars’ hidden taboo for longevity and deathlessness.

One must not violate the true regulations, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances of the Supreme Metropolis of the Dao.

**Yang Brightness Grand Marshal’s Mansion:**
Nine hundred twenty ranks, nine hundred million myriad spirit officials—flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, jade lads and jade maidens—each nine hundred million myriad persons.

**Yin Essence High Steward’s Mansion:**
Five hundred fifty ranks, nine hundred million myriad spirit officials—flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, jade lads and jade maidens—each nine hundred million myriad persons.

**Perfected Person Controller of the Vacant’s Mansion:**
Seven hundred seventy ranks, nine hundred million myriad spirit officials—flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, jade lads and jade maidens—each nine hundred million myriad persons.

**Mysterious Darkness Mobile Striker’s Mansion:**
Eight hundred ranks, nine hundred million myriad spirit officials—flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, jade lads and jade maidens—each nine hundred million myriad persons.

**Cinnabar Prime Dipper Lord’s Mansion:**
Seven hundred twenty ranks, nine hundred million myriad spirit officials—flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, golden lads and jade maidens—each nine hundred million myriad persons.

**Northern Culmen Grand Constancy’s Mansion:**
Seven hundred forty ranks, nine hundred million myriad spirit officials—flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, golden lads and jade maidens—each nine hundred million myriad persons.

**Celestial Pass Supreme Thearch’s Mansion:**
Nine hundred ranks, nine hundred million myriad spirit officials—flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, golden lads and jade maidens—each nine hundred million myriad persons.

**Assistant Heaven Honored Jade Emperor’s Mansion:**
Nine hundred ninety ranks, nine hundred million myriad spirit officials—flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, golden lads and jade maidens—each nine hundred million myriad persons.

**Assisting Heaven Imperial Perfected’s Mansion:**
Nine hundred ninety ranks, nine hundred million myriad spirit officials—flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, golden lads and jade maidens—each nine hundred million myriad persons.
The talisman is inscribed in vermilion.

**Supreme Clarity Purple-Woven Interlaced Sash Register**, also called *Turning Chariot Interlaced Sash*, or *Perfect Dao Contract*, or *Primal Beginning Great Contract*.

The Nine Stars’ inner taboo and hidden secret names are as follows:
The Nine Stars’ taboo names are all inscribed in vermilion.

The Nine Sovereigns’ inner taboos on the right are to be kept secret by the recipient, transmitted orally at the river’s mouth as true esoterica.³ The Nine Openings Star Chart, along with pacing the hours and meditative visualization, should be practiced at dawn and dusk—first knocking the teeth nine times, then silently intoning the names of the stars:

First, the essence of the Supreme Star, named *Dark Pivot*.
May this disciple’s body attain flying immortality, riding the void and mounting the floating.

Second, the essence of the Primordial Star, named *Northern Terrace*.
May this disciple’s body attain flying immortality, roaming the grotto-chambers.

Third, the essence of the Perfected Star, named *Northern Culmen Supreme Perfected*.
May this disciple’s body attain flying immortality, governing the Three Mysteries.

Fourth, the essence of the Pivot Star, named *Revolving Root*.
May this disciple’s body gain a jade name, ranked among flying immortals.

Fifth, the essence of the Network Star, named *Celestial Balance*.
May this disciple’s body attain flying immortality, ascending to Supreme Clarity.

Sixth, the essence of the Chronicle Star, named *Life Mechanism*.
May this disciple’s body attain flying immortality, with name inscribed in the Grand Tenuity.

Seventh, the essence of the Pass Star, named *Dark Yang*.
May this disciple’s body attain flying immortality, empowered to command jade lads.

Eighth, the essence of the Imperial Star, named *Supreme Jade Sovereign*.
May this disciple’s body attain flying immortality, ascending the terrace of the Latter Sage.

Ninth, the essence of the Venerable Star, named *Grand Tenuity Imperial Lord*.
May this disciple’s body attain flying immortality, with name entered into the Cinnabar Jade Chamber.

After reciting the nine invocations, knock the teeth nine more times. Practice as you will, guarding and revering these secrets—do not transmit them recklessly. Follow these methods faithfully, and the true Dao will naturally be perfected.

*Tai Sui* [Year of] *Bao Ju*

The *Supervision of Transmission* concludes the *Shangqing Qu Su Jue Ci Lu* (Esoteric Oral Instructions on the Winding Silk of the Supreme Clarity).

[1] Supplemented according to the *Shangqing Gaoshang Yu Chen Feng Kui Qu Su Shang Jing* (Supreme Scripture of the Supreme Clarity Jade Dawn and Phoenix Constellation Winding Silk).
[2] This title was supplied by the editor based on the meaning of the text.
[3] The original text read: *The true instructions are named and transmitted orally.*

chunks.original_text: 上清曲素诀辞箓 经名：上清曲素诀辞箓。 撰人不详，约出於南北期。 系纂集《尚素诀辞》、《豁落七元》、《河图宝箓》等六种上清经箓而成。 一卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》正一部。 上清曲素诀辞箓 一名九天凤炁玄丘大书 太极左真人授 太上授左真人，以传东海方诸宫青童大君，使传上士宿有玉名，应为神仙真人者。 佩之三十年，得见三元君，迎圣君於上清金阙。 七百年听传二人。 斋中香一斤，受毕，歃血金绢之誓，以代盟血登坛〔之〕约。 〔曲素〕#1诀辞 曲素以威六天之鬼，役众精之神，命五帝，制五岳，符川泽，召百鬼。 诀辞以摄名山之虎豹，御百川之蛟龙，使万鬼，驱万邪。 已上符，并朱书。 盟诀

chunks.original_text: 白绢三十尺，白绢以保血液之券，以代曲素之歃血，不斋不盛解箓。 素锦二十尺，素锦以保神仙之券，以为七百年三传誓，入疾入水入火入山〔入〕室带箓。 金镮三双，金镮以保长生大度券，以为保心不滞之约，道士无此文，不得见三元君。 香用九两，香以保通灵之券，以为冥灵之盟，又无以招摄六天之鬼者也。 男受之北向，师南向。 女受之南向，师北向。 投书及祭，当口传於师诀。 授时北向。 男授之十年，又一斋投书。 女授之十年，一祭。 箓酒脯，列於一座室之中，请太清高真景灵真人，太上丈人宫奉戒。 如受者对箓口传，不用文於绢镮香誓身。 太清高仙景云真人启天大箓，太上丈人下受五岳君，佩之去祸除殃，辟恶逐邪，扞众精，徙百禽，使鬼物，延年十年，还魂却老，安身长存。 一名三天必生契。 九天丈人，领白素玉女官十人，布在弟子左右。 已上符，除随笔写定颜色外，余并系朱书。 九天凤炁玄丘真书，玄都丈人仙科，授佩三日，委以青帛、镮三双，香缯以盟授，传记太岁，不慢不欺，不恶不疾，行仁累德，存神念真，佩录者神仙也。 豁落七元箓 日景丹元黄书符

chunks.original_text: 月景黄元青书符 岁星朱书符 荧惑黄书符 太白黑书符 辰星青书符 镇星朱书符 朱符朱书符 朱符朱书符 黑符黑书符 雌黄符黄书符 右此一条，掾书自佩。 本以日月五星为七元，其外复五符，应是《消魔经》中符。 但《消魔经》凡有四十九符，其经皆空处置，而各有广狭。 今此亦有数枚，余皆零落。 又一黄符，其经云是《真诰》中所出，云太极真人勑丰台北帝符，在玉马经上者，未详审尔。 不然，七元符传世经中粗有施用法，而今是佩本，故无说谓。 宜且依真〔诰〕，用杂色书杂彩上，受而佩之。 勑丰台一说，符诰云：凡盛此符，以重紫之囊，佩之於头上矣。 上清十天召龙箓 已上符并朱书。 上清八威召龙箓 维某年某月朔某日，某州县某宫观受某法箓某岳真人姓名，恭诣上清大洞法师某君门下，拜受上清回车毕道玉情秘箓、大洞真经等，誓依玄科修行，救人接物，如违誓约，甘受冥考，以身谢天地水令三官，不敢怨恨。 急急如太上玄科律令。 已上并朱书。

chunks.translated_text:
The Nine Sovereigns’ inner taboos on the right are to be kept secret by the recipient, transmitted orally at the river’s mouth as true esoterica.³ The Nine Openings Star Chart, along with pacing the hours and meditative visualization, should be practiced at dawn and dusk—first knocking the teeth nine times, then silently intoning the names of the stars:

First, the essence of the Supreme Star, named *Dark Pivot*.
May this disciple’s body attain flying immortality, riding the void and mounting the floating.

Second, the essence of the Primordial Star, named *Northern Terrace*.
May this disciple’s body attain flying immortality, roaming the grotto-chambers.

Third, the essence of the Perfected Star, named *Northern Culmen Supreme Perfected*.
May this disciple’s body attain flying immortality, governing the Three Mysteries.

Fourth, the essence of the Pivot Star, named *Revolving Root*.
May this disciple’s body gain a jade name, ranked among flying immortals.

Fifth, the essence of the Network Star, named *Celestial Balance*.
May this disciple’s body attain flying immortality, ascending to Supreme Clarity.

Sixth, the essence of the Chronicle Star, named *Life Mechanism*.
May this disciple’s body attain flying immortality, with name inscribed in the Grand Tenuity.

Seventh, the essence of the Pass Star, named *Dark Yang*.
May this disciple’s body attain flying immortality, empowered to command jade lads.

Eighth, the essence of the Imperial Star, named *Supreme Jade Sovereign*.
May this disciple’s body attain flying immortality, ascending the terrace of the Latter Sage.

Ninth, the essence of the Venerable Star, named *Grand Tenuity Imperial Lord*.
May this disciple’s body attain flying immortality, with name entered into the Cinnabar Jade Chamber.

After reciting the nine invocations, knock the teeth nine more times. Practice as you will, guarding and revering these secrets—do not transmit them recklessly. Follow these methods faithfully, and the true Dao will naturally be perfected.

*Tai Sui* [Year of] *Bao Ju*
